text: A dog bit a man, and he ran around looking for someone to cure him. A neighbor told him to wet a piece of bread with the blood of his wound and throw it to the dog that bit him. And the man answered and said, If I had given the dog this reward, all the dogs of the city would come and bite me. If you reward evil, it will do you more harm.
title: El hombre al que mordió un perro
author: nan Esopo
